title: D901 AI Smart Camera
metaDesc: Top-tier D901 AI Camera for commercial fleets, featuring multi-channel recording and advanced AI analytics.
fullDescription: The D901 represents the pinnacle of AI Safety Cameras. It supports multi-channel recording and sophisticated AI algorithms to identify pedestrians, cyclists, and other road hazards in real-time. Designed for heavy-duty trucks and buses requiring maximum visibility.
features: Built-in 4G LTE for instant video evidence
packaging: 1x D901 Main Unit, Cable Harness, Installation Kit
